snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web each day for interesting items. Friday's selection includes items on New York's mayor planning to learn to write code, the fading of the term "Web  2.0" and controlling a camera...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web each day for interesting items. Friday's selection includes items on New York's mayor planning to learn to write code, the fading of the term "Web  2.0" and controlling a camera froma phone or a tablet.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: New Year's and New Era
